 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְוָת‎</span> **preposition** ==to, at, beside== (derivation uncertain; see [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>128 n</sup>.; perhaps akin to <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָוָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְוִי‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***join***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְוָת‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***to***), with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִן‎</span>, [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]] the Jews which came up <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִןלְֿוָתָח‎</span> ***from thee*** (***de chez toi***; compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִלְּוַת‎</span>, e.g. [[Exod.8.8|Exod 8:8]]; [[Exod.9.33|Exod 9:33]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] = Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִם‎</span>).
